info.title: HyperscaleCitusManagementClient
info.description: The Microsoft Azure management API provides create, read, update, and delete functionality for Azure PostgreSQL Hyperscale (Citus) resources including server groups, servers, databases, firewall rules, VNET rules, security alert policies, log files and configurations.
